title: MEET48 Token IDOL Hits Record High with 118.2% Surge | Phemex News
text:
The MEET48 token, IDOL, has achieved a new all-time high, reaching $0.0386. This milestone represents a significant 24-hour increase of 118.2%, underscoring a substantial surge in its market value. The sharp rise in IDOL's price reflects heightened interest and investment in the token, marking a notable event in the cryptocurrency market.
MEET48 Token IDOL Soars 118.2% to Record High of $0.0386
